text: Vladimir Abramovich Etush () (6 May 1922 – 9 March 2019) was a Soviet movie and television actor and a People's Artist of the USSR (1984), an honorary title granted to citizens of the Soviet Union. Etush died on 9 March 2019 from heart failure in Moscow, aged 96.Умер актер Владимир Этуш ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1922 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Russian actors
title: Vladimir Etush
